jigsaw.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a picture cut up into many pieces that you try to fit together
jigsaw.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a very complicated situation, especially one that you are trying to understand
jigsaw.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: As he explained, another piece of the jigsaw fell into place.
jigsaw.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a tool for cutting out shapes in thin pieces of wood
